DOC.brief_title: The Effect Real Time Continuous Glucose Monitoring Subjects With Pre-diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The protocol prospective , non-blinded , randomize control study person newly diagnose pre-diabetes compare effect real-time continuous glucose monitoring ( RT-CGM ) combine diet lifestyle education diet lifestyle education alone . During `` wash-in '' phase group wear mask CGM 1 week baseline 12 week . Those randomized RT-CGM wear 4 cycle 2 week on/1 week next 12 week . Both group follow-up primary care provider clinically indicate next year quarterly measurement blood pressure , weight , BMI . At end period , wear mask CGM 1 week .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old Newly diagnose prediabetes ( within previous 6 month ) FPG > = 110125mg/dl A1c > = 6 % 6.4 % Able independently measure read finger stick blood glucose level Willing wear CGM device 12 week study period Willing test blood sugar fingerstick twice per day wear CGM DEERS eligible Using medication prediabetes Women pregnant , lactate , plan become pregnant , without safe contraceptive method ; female subject undergo pregnancy test via serum HcG initial blood testing . Subjects take glucocorticoid , amphetamine , anabolic , weightreducing agent course study . Active Duty service member likely deploy 18month study period .
